mapper.insert: insert into diet (idx, dietFoodName, dietKcal, dietCarbs, dietProtein, dietFat, dietMemo, dietWriteDate, dietWriteTime) values (diet_idx_seq.nextval, #{dietFoodName}, #{dietKcal}, #{dietCarbs}, #{dietProtein}, #{dietFat}, #{dietMemo}, #{dietWriteDate}, #{dietWriteTime})
mapper.select: select * from diet where dietWriteDate = #{date} order by dietWriteTime asc
